comment.author: 33574471@N03
comment._content: Oh Dios mío!.... Contraste enorme. Me parece preciosa y demasiado triste a la vez.

comment.author: 39585299@N05
comment._content: At this age, however they sleep and wherever ..... all is right with the world for a moment..To view a sleeping child who appears quite healthy for now ... it is a space for any parent ( hopefully there is one, or a guardian - a friend or the photographer ) to take a breath and feel the love. .. against the shade of the mud wall.

comment.author: 63947762@N08
comment._content: Me veio a lembrança da imagem do menino Jesus, envolto em panos na mangedoura!
